verbose_text: In contrast to other TLRs, TLR3 signaling occurs via TIR-domain-containing adapter inducing interferon-beta (TRIF)-dependent pathways and does not require myeloid differentiation primary response 88 (Myd88)-dependent pathways XREF_BIBR.
